activities:
Sycle.Net is a hosted Software as a Service practice management system for audiologists (hearing specialists).  The system stores patient information such as name, address, birthdate and medical records associated with hearing evaluations and treatment.

To view our Privacy Policy please visit http://web.sycle.net/privacy-policy/
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data is stored electronically at a secured facility.  Personal data includes: name, address, birthdate and medical records associated with hearing evaluations and treatment.
privacyprograms: Strict adherence to confidentiality of customer information including the destruction of any files or documents used for professional services (development and testing ) as well as customer support.
recoursemech: For complaints that cannot be resolved between Sycle.net and the complainant,Sycle.net has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European data protection authorities (EU DPAs), as well as the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
